author: Staff Reporter
text:
Technicians checking the EVMs stored in the strong room in Tamil Nadu Warehousing Corporation building in Tirunelveli.— Photo: M. Lakshmi Arun

As many as 2,340 electronic voting machines (EVMs) have arrived here on Saturday ahead of the Assembly elections for 10 constituencies across Tirunelveli district.

These EVMs had been dispatched from Gujarat amidst tight security.

Already, several EVMs had reached Tirunelveli from Gujarat and Maharashtra in two phases.

The Electronic Voting Machines received so far had been stored in the strong room in Tamil Nadu Warehousing Corporation building at Sreepuram here, sources said.

To polling stations

After due checking and calibration by technicians of Bharat Electronics Limited, the EVMs would be sent to 2,929 polling stations across the district a day prior to polling, sources added.
title: 2,340 EVMs reach Tirunelveli
